resources.string:
• Name: Matthew Spire 
• GitHub: https://github.com/matthew-spire 
• Location: Charleston, SC


I have dabbled in a number of different programming languages, from Assembly (x86) to Python. I know a little about a lot, which means to say that I still have a lot to learn. I do have a foundation to build off of. I am excited to learn more about Kotlin and Android development.


When it comes to goals, I hope to learn Kotlin and Android so that I can build a web app and a mobile app that utilize the same API. Hopefully my idea for a web app will take off and I will be able to support myself and my family.


As for hobbies, I like to walk my dogs, run, play video games, and golf. Watching movies and getting lost on YouTube is how I unwind.
